channel.title: Client Error?
channel.description:
i got NO MORE errors in my compiler but when i try to go on my server using my client i get this error Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 131 at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.method374(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java:817) at Class25.method315(Class25.java:1779) at Class25.method314(Class25.java:1299) at Class25.method313(Class25.java:1128) at client.method146(client.java:12653) at client.method102(client.java:8019) at client.method9(client.java:9174) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4693) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
how do i fix? im using a non-renamed btw

item.title: Client Error?
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

something on the server is causing the client to freeze, which means the client can’t load it.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i got NO MORE errors in my compiler
but when i try to go on my server using my client i get this error
Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 131
at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.method374(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java:817)
at Class25.method315(Class25.java:1779)
at Class25.method314(Class25.java:1299)
at Class25.method313(Class25.java:1128)
at client.method146(client.java:12653)
at client.method102(client.java:8019)
at client.method9(client.java:9174)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122)
at client.run(client.java:4693)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

how do i fix?
im using a non-renamed btw
